original_text: The field is the world; the good seed are the children of the kingdom; but the tares are the children of the wicked one;
korean_text: 밭은 세상이요 좋은 씨는 천국의 아들들이요 가라지는 악한 자의 아들들이요

sentences.original_text: the good seed are the children of the kingdom
but the tares are the children of the wicked one
